text: Pleše () is a settlement in the hills east of Škofljica in central Slovenia. The Municipality of Škofljica is part of the traditional region of Lower Carniola and is now included in the Central Slovenia Statistical Region.Škofljica municipal site ==References== ==External links== * *Pleše on Geopedia Category:Populated places in the Municipality of Škofljica
title: Pleše, Škofljica
